sneakers.title: Nike Air Force 1 Mid React
sneakers.description: Combining modern comfort with legendary basketball style, this design offers a futuristic feel. Perfectly positioned thanks to the low sole, React technology lets you feel the soft and flexible cushioning.A rich mix of materials in the upper adds a distinctive twist to the famous basketball style.

sneakers.title: Jordan Max Aura 2
sneakers.description: Combining modern comfort with legendary basketball style, this design offers a futuristic feel. Perfectly positioned thanks to the low sole, React technology lets you feel the soft and flexible cushioning.A rich mix of materials in the upper adds a distinctive twist to the famous basketball style.

sneakers.title: Nike W Af1 Shadow
sneakers.description: Nike, which is the first basketball shoe with a Nike Air unit, once worn by NBA legends Charles Barkley and Moses Malone, is named after Air Force 1 , the plane that the American president boarded, and adapts its style to every life form. AF 1 Shadow 1 personalizes the iconic style with renewed characteristic details.

sneakers.title: Nike Air Force 1 07
sneakers.description: The Nike Air Force 1 '07 dazzles with its looks. Comfort on the court and stylish off the court, this authentic basketball style takes a fresh take on the stylish features you know well, such as period elements, 1980s construction and eye-catching details.

sneakers.title: Adidas Forum Mid J
sneakers.description: More than just a shoe. It took the stage at adidas Forum '84 and won a lot of love in both the woodworking and music worlds. These classic shoes bring back the '80s attitude, hardwood energy and iconic X-strap ankle design in a fresh design in an upper designed for the streets.

sneakers.title: Champion Mid Cut Shoe Z70 Mid
sneakers.description: Step out with a big dose of retro power in these men’s mid high-top trainers, coming in with a fresh design and finished with our branding on the side.

sneakers.title: Converse Chuck 70 Plus Canvas
sneakers.description: The Converse Chuck 70 Plus Canvas is a convincing new edition of the Converse classic and features a futuristic, black and white design with iconic details, also in Women's with smaller sizes. Eye-catchers are the asymmetrical lines and the split rubber, which give the chuck an expressive look.

sneakers.title: Vans Old Skool
sneakers.description: Vans Old Skool offers you a light and comfortable experience with its stylish, simple but assertive look, with side stripes and the legendary waffle pattern bottom sole, which designer Paul Van Doren defined as the 'jazz line' in 1977.

sneakers.title: Puma Mayze Stack Wns
sneakers.description: Stack it up. This fresh update to the Mayze is ready to take you to new heights. Mayze Stack features a playful upper design that remixes the brand’s most iconic classics, plus a distorted, fashion-forward rubber tooling. This execution features a leather upper and suede formstrip.

sneakers.title: Puma Slipstream Wns
sneakers.description: In 1987, the PUMA Slipstream entered the scene as a basketball shoe. A high-flying, dunking, assertive basketball shoe. Now she's back in her original mid-cut form, with a range of heritage-inspired color schemes. All that and its '80s chunky lines make it a PUMA favorite driven not by hype but by culture.
